mapper.select: select book.*, publisher.name as pub_name from book left join publisher on publisher.id = book.publisher_id
select book.*, publisher.name as pub_name from book left join publisher on publisher.id = book.publisher_id where book.id = #{id}
select book.*, publisher.name as pub_name from book left join publisher on publisher.id = book.publisher_id where title = #{title}
mapper.insert: insert into book (ISBN, title, year, size, count, publisher_id, description, added_at) values (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{year}, #{size}, #{count}, #{publisher.id}, #{description}, #{addedAt})
mapper.update: update book set (isbn=#{isbn}, title='#{title}', year=#{year}, size=#{size}, count=#{count}, publisher_id=#{publisher.id}, description='#{description}', added_at='#{addedAt}') where id=#{id}
